reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: EAC Lake Victoria Basin Commission Trust Fund

description.narrative: The Lake Victoria Basin Commission (LVBC) has invited the Government of Finland to join the LVBC partnership fund. The LVBC was established by the East African Community (EAC, members Burundi Kenia Ruanda Tansania and Uganda) in 2005. The LVBC partnership fund is part of a partnership agreement signed in 2001 between the EAC and the Governments of Sweden France and Norway the World Bank and East African Development Bank. The overall objective of the fund is to promote sustainable development in the Lake Vic toria Basin. The specific objective is to provide sources of funding for the identification and formulation of projects and activities, policy development and capacity building.
